name: Momo (slowchange)
description:
Momo was separated from her friend while exploring the caves of Mount Joji – help her find her way back to the surface while collecting gems, dodging slimes, and avoiding icy pitfalls. 

Momo is a retro 2D platformer developed with the Pico-8 game engine. It's my first 'complete' (albeit very small) game, so feedback is welcome. 

Thanks for playing!

Big thanks to Martin, Scott, Cam and Josh for playtesting.
